📊 Key Indicators:
• VIX: 15.2 (Low - Complacency)

• High risk appetite
• Growth outperforming value
• Tech sector leadership
• Low volatility environment

data.name: Buffett Investment Framework
data.creator: Warren Buffett
data.core_principle: Buy wonderful companies at fair prices

data.name: Circle of Competence
data.rule: Only invest in what you understand
questions: Can I explain the business model to a 10-year-old?
Do I understand how the company makes money?
Can I predict what this business will look like in 10 years?

data.name: Brand Moat
data.durability_test: Will customers still prefer this brand in 20 years?

data.name: Network Effects
data.durability_test: Does each new user make the product more valuable?

data.name: Cost Advantages
data.durability_test: Can competitors match our costs even with unlimited capital?

data.name: Switching Costs
data.durability_test: Would switching require significant time, money, or risk?

data.name: Intangible Assets
data.durability_test: Are these assets legally protected and hard to replicate?

data.name: Owner Earnings
data.formula: Net Income + D&A - Maintenance CapEx +/- Working Capital Changes
data.quality_check: Owner earnings should exceed reported earnings for quality businesses

data.name: Dalio Economic Machine
data.creator: Ray Dalio
data.core_principle: Economy works like a machine with predictable cycles

data.name: Productivity Growth
data.driver: Technology, knowledge accumulation, and efficiency improvements

data.name: expansion
characteristics: Asset prices rising faster than fundamentals

data.name: All-Weather Portfolio
data.philosophy: Balance risk across all economic environments

data.name: Paradigm Shifts
data.concept: Major changes in market regimes that last decades
identification_signals: What everyone believes becomes too expensive

data.name: Owner Earnings
data.concept: True cash earnings available to owners

formula.base: Net Income + Depreciation & Amortization - Maintenance CapEx +/- Working Capital Changes
formula.detailed: NI + D&A - CapEx_maintenance + Changes_in_NWC - Stock_comp + Tax_benefit_stock_comp

steps.estimation: Use 70% of D&A or analyze company guidance

good_signs: Owner earnings growing faster than revenue
red_flags: Declining owner earnings with rising net income

step4_optimization.method: Minimize variance subject to equal risk contribution

data.name: Quality-Value Matrix
data.concept: Combine Buffett quality with value investing
